page1.title: HEADER
page1.tf0:
Semboller ekrandaki her yere ödeme yapar. Bir spinin sonunda ekrandaki aynı sembolün toplam
sayısı, kazanma değerini belirler.
page1.item2:
This is the SCATTER symbol.
SCATTER symbol is
present on all reels.
SCATTER pays
on any position

page2.title: TUMBLE FEATURE
page2.tf0:
The TUMBLE FEATURE means that after every spin, winning
combinations are paid and all winning symbols
disappear. The remaining symbols fall to the bottom of the
screen and the empty positions are replaced
with symbols coming from above.
page2.tf1:
Tumbling will continue until no more winning combinations
appear as a result of a tumble. There's no limit to the
number of possible tumbles.
page2.tf2:
All wins are added to the player's balance after all of the
tumbles resulted from a base spin have been played.
page2.tf3:
These are the multiplier symbols. They are present on all
reels and can hit randomly during
spins and tumbles in both base game and FREE SPINS.
page2.tf4:
Whenever a MULTIPLIER symbol hits, it takes a random
multiplier value of 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, 6x, 8x, 10x, 12x, 15x, 20x,
25x, 50x, 100x, 250x or 500x.
page2.tf5:
When the tumbling sequence ends, the values of all
MULTIPLIER symbols on the screen are added
together and the total win of the sequence is multiplied
by the final value.

page3.title: FREE SPINS RULES
page3.tf0:
The FREESPIN FEATURE is awarded when 4 or more
SCATTER symbols hit anywhere on the screen.
The round starts with 15 free spins.
page3.tf1:
During the FREE SPINS round, whenever a MULTIPLIER
symbol hits and the spin results in a win, the MULTIPLIER
value gets added to the total multiplier.
For the whole duration of the round, whenever any new MULTIPLIER symbol
hits and results in a win, the total multiplier value
is also used to multiply the win.
page3.tf2:
When 3 or more SCATTER symbols hit during
the FREE SPIN ROUND, 5 additional freespins are awarderd.
Special reels are in play during FREE SPIN ROUND
page3.tf4:
The player has the option to select ANTE BET, 
 increasing the bet per line by 25x.
 The chance to win free spins naturally is doubled.
 More SCATTER symbols are present on the reels.
page3.tf6:
The FREE SPINS ROUND can be instantly triggered from the base game by buying it for 100x current total bet. 
When the 25x ante bet feature is enabled, the BUY FREE SPINS feature is disabled

page4.title: GAME RULES
page4.tf1:
Symbols pay anywhere.
All wins are multiplied by the base bet.
page4.tf2: All values are expressed as actual wins in coins.
page4.tf3:
When winning with multiple symbols,
all wins are added to the total win.
page4.tf4:
Free spins is awarded to the player after
the round completes. The total win from past
Freespins includes the total win of the series.
page4.tf5:
The theoretical RTP of this game is 96.5%. 
When using "ANTE BET," the RTP of the game is 96.5%.
The RTP of the game when using "BUY FREE SPİNS" is 96.5%
page4.tf7: Any malfunction voids all pays and plays.

page5.title: HOW TO PLAY

textCombined1.part2:
buttons to change the bet value
and open the bet menu.

page5.tf1: Select the bet you want to use in the game.

textCombined2.part1:
Opens the SETTINGS menu contains settings
which affect the way the game is being played.

page5.tf4:
The CREDIT and BET labels display
the current balance and the total bet. 
Click on the labels to switch between token
view and cash view.

textCombined4.part2: You can use the buttons to increase

page5.tf5:
or decrease the current bet and make bet adjustments and
open the betting menu where you can make
changes to your bets.
page5.tf6:
You can use the buttons to move
the current bet up or down and open the betting menu 
where you can change bet allocations.

page6.title: SETTINGS MENU
page6.tf0:
INTRO SCREEN - toggles the introductory screen
on and off
AMBIENCE - toggles the ambient sound and music in
the game on and off
SOUND EFFECTS - Turns the game's sound effects
on and off
GAME HISTORY - Opens the game history page
page6.tf3:
The bet menu shows the bet multiplier available
in the game, and the current
total bet in both coins and cash.
page6.tf4: COIN VALUE fields to change the values.
page6.tf5:
The maximum win amount
is limited to 5000 times the bet.
page6.tf6:
A round yields up to 4 DP,
and all remaining features are lost.
page6.tf8:
Click on the buttons showing the number of possible
auto-spins to start Autoplay
SKIP SCREEN option autospins the feature
introduction and end screens after a short period of time

page1.title: PAYTABLE
page1.tf0:
Symbols pay anywhere on the screen. 
The total number of the same symbol on the screen at the end of a spin determines the value of the win.
page1.item2:
This is the SCATTER symbol.
SCATTER symbol is present on all reels.
SCATTER pays on any position

page2.title: TUMBLE FEATURE
page2.tf0:
The TUMBLE FEATURE means that after every spin, winning combinations are paid and all winning symbols
disappear. The remaining symbols fall to the bottom of the screen and the empty positions are replaced
with symbols coming from above.
page2.tf1:
Tumbling will continue until no more winning combinations appear as a result of a tumble. There's no limit to the
number of possible tumbles.
page2.tf2: All wins are added to the player's balance after all of the tumbles resulted from a base spin have been played.
page2.tf3:
These are the multiplier symbols. They are present on all reels and can hit randomly during
spins and tumbles in both base game and FREE SPINS.
page2.tf4:
Whenever a MULTIPLIER symbol hits, it takes a random multiplier value of 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, 6x, 8x, 10x, 12x, 15x, 20x,
25x, 50x, 100x, 250x or 500x.
page2.tf5:
When the tumbling sequence ends, the values of all MULTIPLIER symbols on the screen are added
together and the total win of the sequence is multiplied by the final value.

page3.title: FREESPIN RULES
page3.tf0:
The FREESPIN FEATURE is awarded when 4 or more SCATTER symbols hit anywhere on the screen. 
The round starts with 15 free spins.
page3.tf1:
During the FREE SPINS round, whenever a MULTIPLIER symbol hits and the spin results in a win, the MULTIPLIER value gets
added to the total multiplier. For the whole duration of the round, whenever any new MULTIPLIER symbol hits and results
in a win, the total multiplier value is also used to multiply the win.
page3.tf2:
When 3 or more SCATTER symbols hit during the FREE SPIN ROUND, 5 additional freespins are awarded. 
Special reels are in play during FREE SPIN ROUND
page3.tf4:
The player has the option to select ANTE BET, increasing the bet per line by 25x.
 The chance to win free spins naturally is doubled. More SCATTER symbols
 are present on the reels.
page3.tf6:
The FREE SPINS ROUND can be instantly triggered from the base game by buying it for
 100x current total bet. When the 25x ante bet feature is enabled,
 the BUY FREE SPINS feature is disabled

page4.title: GAME RULES
page4.tf0: High volatility games pay out less often on average but the chance to hit big wins in a short time span is higher.
page4.tf1:
Symbols pay anywhere.
All wins are multiplied by the base bet.
page4.tf2: All values are expressed as actual wins in coins.
page4.tf3: When winning with multiple symbols, all wins are added to the total win.
page4.tf4:
Free spins is awarded to the player after the round completes.
The total win from past Freespins includes the total win of the series.
page4.tf5:
The theoretical RTP of this game is 96.5%. 
When using "ANTE BET," the RTP of the game is 96.5%.
The RTP of the game when using "BUY FREE SPİNS" is 96.50%.
page4.tf7: Any malfunction voids all pays and plays.
